original_text: (Some people called the Emites once lived there. There were many of them and they were as strong and tall as the Anakites.
korean_text: (이전에는 에밈 사람이 거기 거주하였는데 아낙 족속 같이 강하고 많고 키가 크므로

sentences.original_text: Some people called the Emites once lived there.
sentences.korean_translation: 에밋이라 불리는 사람들이 한때 그곳에 살았습니다.

sentences.original_text: and they were as strong and tall as the Anakites.
